title: Apocalyptic Prophesies - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/9/20
itunes:title: Apocalyptic Prophesies - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/9/20
description:
George Noory and biblical scholar Bill Salus explore his work reviewing prophecy from the Bible, and whether there were predictions of the current coronavirus outbreak, and how that may be linked to the coming of the Antichrist and the end of the world.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
